label: XeroApi
description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Xero API.

tools.name: AddContactHistoryRecord
tools.description:
Create a new history record for a contact in Xero.

This tool allows you to add a new history entry for a specific contact in Xero. Use it to log interactions, notes, or any relevant information about the contact.

parameters.name: contact_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a Contact in Xero. Required to specify which contact the history record is for.

parameters.name: tenant_identifier
parameters.description: Xero identifier for the Tenant. Required to specify which tenant's contact history to update.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description: A unique string up to 128 characters to safely retry requests without duplicate processing.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: FetchAllXeroContacts
tools.description:
Retrieve all contacts from a Xero organization.

Use this tool to obtain a list of all contacts within a specified Xero organization. It should be called when there's a need to access or manage contact information in Xero.

parameters.name: tenant_identifier
parameters.description: A unique string to identify the tenant in Xero.

parameters.name: contact_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of ContactIDs to retrieve specific contacts. Use this to filter the contacts returned by their unique IDs in a single call.

parameters.name: filter_by_element
parameters.description: Specify conditions to filter contacts by any element within their data fields.

parameters.name: include_archived_contacts
parameters.description: Set to true to include contacts with a status of ARCHIVED in the response. False will exclude them.

parameters.name: modified_since_timestamp
parameters.description: Retrieve only records created or modified after the specified timestamp. Use ISO 8601 format for the timestamp.

parameters.name: pagination_page_number
parameters.description: The specific page number to retrieve when fetching contacts. Each page returns up to 100 contacts.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Number of contact records to retrieve per page.

parameters.name: retrieve_summary_only_contacts
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve only lightweight contact fields, excluding computation-heavy data for faster API responses.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: A case-insensitive search term for filtering contacts by Name, FirstName, LastName, ContactNumber, or EmailAddress.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specifies the sorting order for contacts based on a specified element, such as name or date.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: SetupConversionDetails
tools.description:
Set up chart of accounts and conversion details in Xero.

Call this tool to configure the chart of accounts, conversion date, and balances in Xero. Useful for initializing financial data during setup.

Note: Understanding the request schema is necessary to properly create
the stringified JSON input object for execution.

Modes:
- GET_REQUEST_SCHEMA: Returns the schema. Only call if you don't
  already have it. Do NOT call repeatedly if you already received
  the schema.
- EXECUTE: Performs the operation with the provided request body
  JSON.

If you need the schema, call with mode='get_request_schema' ONCE, then execute.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Operation mode: 'get_request_schema' returns the OpenAPI spec for the request body, 'execute' performs the actual operation

parameters.name: tenant_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the tenant in Xero.  Required when mode is 'execute', ignored when mode is 'get_request_schema'.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description: A unique key to safely retry requests without duplicate processing. Max 128 characters.  Only used when mode is 'execute'.

parameters.name: request_body
parameters.description: Stringified JSON representing the request body. Required when mode is 'execute', ignored when mode is 'get_request_schema'

summary:
The XeroApi toolkit enables seamless interaction with the Xero API for comprehensive accounting tasks. Designed for developers, it facilitates data retrieval and management in Xero.

**Capabilities**  
- Integrate and automate accounting functions with Xero.  
- Access detailed financial reports and historical data.  
- Manage contacts, invoices, expenses, and transactions.  
- Record and track history for various accounting entities.  
- Fetch and manipulate attachments related to invoices and transactions.

**OAuth**  
Utilizes OAuth 2.0 authentication with scopes including `accounting.attachments`, `accounting.contacts`, and more.

**Secrets**  
No secrets are required for this toolkit.
